title: Financial Planner and Analyst at TEKsystems (West Miami, FL)
text:
Source: Sologig Top Three Skills: 1) Prepare financial and business related analysis and research in such areas as financial and expense performance, rate of return, depreciation, working capital, and investments. 2) Understanding, creating, and managing budgets 3) Project based accounting (ability to create financial reports specifically designed to track the financial progress of projects, which can then be used by managers to aid project management. 4) Excel Expert (Advanced Financial Formulas and understanding how to build them, Pivot Tables. Financial functions (amortization schedules, npv (net present value or return on investments). 
Responsibilities * Prepares financial and business related analysis and research in such areas as financial and expense performance, rate of return, depreciation, working capital, and investments. * Prepares consolidated forecasts and budgets and analyzes trends in revenue, expense, capital expenditures and other related areas. * Provide financial support in achieving a disciplined budget, forecast and measurement process for expense, resources and capital * Utilizing PC and/or mainframe based systems and software; compiles and prepares reports, graphs and charts of data developed. * Assists with special financial and business related studies and cooperates with other departments in preparing analyses. * Provide monthly variance explanation to forecast and budget * Assist with compilation and analysis of consolidated budgets and long range plans. * Maintains and coordinates group completion of financial review templates and meetings. * Performs other duties as required.
